info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:25AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow with initial snow mixing with sleet and some freezing rain in Litchfield County this afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze in Litchfield County. * WHERE...Northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and in eastern New York, the eastern Catskills, mid-Hudson Valley and central and southern Taconics. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute with snow ending during the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may reach around half of an inch per hour at times today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
